WorkItem.ClosedComment: Created a neutral default Resources file (with English strings).
WorkItem.Description:
Opening "show pending updates" on the popup menu I get the following error:

> Could not find any resources appropriate for the specified culture or the neutral culture.  Make sure "ShowPendingUpdates.Resources.Resources.resources" was correctly embedded or linked into assembly "ShowPendingUpdates" at compile time, or that all the satellite assemblies required are loadable and fully signed.

My setup is the following:
Wsus 3.0 sp2 on Windows 2008 R2, .net framework 4.0 full.
My culture is it-it.

The error is the same for every client computer with different configurations and operative systems (Xp, seven, 2003).

Comments.Message:
Can you send me an email to package.publisher@free.fr 
I will send you a fixed release, you will able to test it on your computer.
